about_the_game:
Multiple Role Playing

Physical exorcism.

Gun Enchanting

A variety of magic free combination, strengthen the shooting effect of firearms.

Data Architecture

"It adopts a numerical structure similar to WOW and Jianwang 3.
Supports long-term content updates (free)."

Various scenes of land, sea and air

"With the development of the plot, players will experience the wonderful adventures of drifting, air combat, speeding cars, abyss, and missiles.
At the same time, each leader has playing skills, which require simple exploration and thinking."

Catch zombies as pets

"The ghouls you can see in the game can be caught and cultivated. After feeding fish, swallowing corpses, and sucking marrow, they can grow into reliable combat partners.
In addition, some renegade mercenaries and armored vehicles can also become your partners."

Extraordinary gun weapons

"Cannons, muskets, stun guns, swords, axes, etc. will be updated in succession.
All are dropped by the world BOSS, and some duo copies are obtained."

Other ways

"1. Fishing: Buy feed to lure the fish you want to catch, but it may also lure water ghosts to take the bait.
Fish can also be farmed, and they can grow very large."
2. Legion hegemony: Form a legion to compete for territory, and the legion that owns the territory can harvest rare coins every day.
3. Corpse battleground: conduct real-time PK and compete for the ladder ranking.
